resources.string: CREATE TABLE urls (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, url TEXT, domain TEXT, title TEXT, visits INTEGER, time INTEGER, favorite BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0, fav_time INTEGER DEFAULT -1)
ALTER TABLE urls ADD COLUMN domain TEXT

SELECT t.id AS id, t.url AS url, t.domain AS domain, t.title AS title, SUM(t.days_count) as count FROM (SELECT urls.id, urls.url, urls.domain, urls.title, (history.time / 86400000 - STRFTIME(\'%s\', DATE(\'now\', \'-6 months\')) / 86400) AS days_count, urls.id AS id, urls.visits as visits, urls.time as time FROM urls, history WHERE urls.id=history.url_id AND history.time>STRFTIME(\'%s\', DATE(\'now\', \'-6 months\'))*1000 AND urls.visits>2 ORDER BY urls.visits ASC) AS t WHERE (SELECT count() FROM blocked_topsites WHERE t.domain=domain)=0 GROUP by t.domain ORDER BY count DESC, t.visits DESC, t.time DESC
CREATE TABLE blocked_topsites (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, domain TEXT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT domain_unique UNIQUE (domain))
